title: Implement Aura (Kovan PoA)
body:
As you can see below - Gitcoin bounty has been funded for this issue (kudos to Gitcoin team).
Below you will find more information on what is expected:

PoA / Aura spec is available here:
- https://wiki.parity.io/Pluggable-Consensus.html#aura
- https://wiki.parity.io/Aura.html

Best place to seek help from the team is Gitter:
- https://gitter.im/nethermindeth/nethermind

1. Write ISealEngine implementation representing Aura block sealing.
2. Write IBlockValidator / IBlockHeaderValidator to validate properly repurposed fields in BlockHeader
3. Make necessary changes to IChainSpecLoader to allow different seal engine to be loaded and change the Runner behaviour so the Clique seal engine and validators are loaded if chainspec declares them.
4. Create unit tests for ISealEngine implementation, unit tests for the new IBlockValidator / IBlockHeaderValidator.
5. Launch Nethermind and sync with Kovan test network (by providing a Kovan chainID).
6. Launch 4 nodes using RunnerSpawner to test a Aura based private network behaviour and proof that the nodes can publish and validate nodes.
7. An implementation that is capable of (5) and (6) will be accepted. Core Nethermind team will be glad to provide all the help needed and introduce changes required to make code more consistent with the whole Nethermind codebase.

https://kovan-testnet.github.io/website/

We assume that PoA is implemented if Nethermind can synchronize fully with Kovan testnet when given Kovan chainspec and pointed at Kovan bootnodes.

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 400.0 DAI (400.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/tkstanczak/nethermind/35/1254). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/tkstanczak/nethermind/35/1254). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $24,254.17 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)

Thanks for the update @mul1sh!
Hey @mul1sh just wanted to check in on this, did you have a chance to make that final commit?
@ceresstation not yet i'm waiting for feedback from some parity guys on some functionality that i'm stuck on, but i'll definitely push it by end of this week
Hey @mul1sh, any updates? Let me know! 😄
hey @mul1sh , what's the latest her?

@ryan-shea i'm currently working on a final PR to this issue. Apologies for the long delay in closing this, its because the online . documentation for the parity AURA algorithm is very sparse, so i had to do alot of digging on how sort this issue, but I communicated to @tkstanczak  all the challenges i faced.

Nonetheless kindly be patient with me a bit final PR is coming, thanks

@ryan-shea the bounty itself can be closed @mul1sh never presented any code here even with numerous times we tried to schedule a code review session. I understand that the task was daunting. We will be delivering this implementation as a bigger task internally.

@tkstanczak sorry for letting you down with my code was and still is in a very bad state because i never could get the Aura spec fully working with nethermind :(. Nevertheless i'm still willing to collaborate with you with your internal implementation if you want, because I did learn a few things on how AURA works while researching on this.

Apologies again @tkstanczak for the long delay.

thanks @mul1sh, it is understandable that this task was much bigger than we were expecting it to be, I would just suggest you to be more open to share the progress and state of code while working on issues in the future.

No need to apologize! With this rate, it was more of a volunteering project and I was aware that you were busy with other projects and exams!

Issue Status: 1. Open 2. **Cancelled**
__The funding of 400.0 DAI (400.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to this issue has been **cancelled** by the bounty submitter__ * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $155,038.69 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)
